author: Anonymous Helix
title: BSL P12 - alternative solution?
question:
For this question, I changed the name of the function to square instead of adding a new value for the image-height parameter of the original rectangle function. Would this be acceptable in an exam scenario, since it didn't specify that we aren't allowed to change the function name? 
(@problem 1)
;; Uncomment the code below and fix the error(s).
;;
;;
;; (rectangle 10 solid red)

(rectangle 10 20 "solid" "red") ;problem bank solution

(square 10 "solid" "red")       ;my solution
instructor_answer: I updated the starter to make it more clear that we want the rectangle solution.
